# isScrollEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can scroll the Look Around view.

## Declaration

```swift
get isScrollEnabled(): boolean;
set isScrollEnabled(value: boolean);
```

## Controlling the interactions with a Look Around view

- **isNavigationEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can navigate inside the Look Around view.
- **isZoomEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether someone can zoom the Look Around view.
